text: Ixora euosmia is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to southern Nigeria and southwestern Cameroon. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Ixora degemensis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. ==External links== *World Checklist of Rubiaceae euosmia Category:Flora of Nigeria Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Ixora euosmia
